mapper.sql: id, task_name, excel_file_id, chart_type, dimension_fields, value_fields, filter_conditions, chart_config, analysis_result, status, error_message, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO analysis_task ( task_name, excel_file_id, chart_type, dimension_fields, value_fields, filter_conditions, chart_config, analysis_result, status, error_message, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{taskName}, #{excelFileId}, #{chartType}, #{dimensionFields}, #{valueFields}, #{filterConditions}, #{chartConfig}, #{analysisResult}, #{status}, #{errorMessage}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM analysis_task WHERE excel_file_id = #{excelFileId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT FROM analysis_task ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT FROM analysis_task WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
